title: ‘Army of the Dead,’ Zack Snyder zombie heist movie filmed in N.J., gets new trailer
body: "Army of the Dead" is a zombie heist movie partially filmed in Atlantic City casinos.Why just watch a heist movie when you can watch a combination heist movie  zombie movie?Director Zack Snyder’s “” is just that.The movie, which was partially filmed in Atlantic City, just got a new trailer after a first look was released in February.Jersey casinos sub in for Las Vegas spots in the film, which sees the cast try to pull off a heist and battle smarter, faster “alpha” zombies at the same time.
